headline: Navigating airline stocks as fares rise & travel trends shift
summary: Third Bridge global head of sector analysts Peter McNally joins Market Domination with Josh Lipton to discuss how to invest in the airline industry and his top picks among the sector. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

content.title: Navigating airline stocks as fares rise & travel trends shift
content.description:
Third Bridge global head of sector analysts Peter McNally joins Market Domination with Josh Lipton to discuss how to invest in the airline industry and his top picks among the sector.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Frontier Airlines Offers Elite Gold Status Through 2026 to Members of Other Airline Loyalty Programs for Just $69
summary: Frontier Airlines (Nasdaq: ULCC) wants to be your new low fare airline, and in partnership with Loyalty Status Co has announced an exclusive offer for members of select loyalty programs with other airlines so they can experience the premium perks of FRONTIER Miles, the most rewarding loyalty program in the sky. For a limited time, consumers with any level of loyalty program membership with Southwest Airlines, JetBlue, Spirit Airlines or Alaska Airlines can upgrade to Frontier Elite Gold status t

headline: VACATION IS MORE FUN WHEN IT'S FLEXIBLE! INTRODUCING GETAWAYS BY SOUTHWEST
summary: Southwest Airlines Co. (NYSE: LUV) is creating more opportunities for Customers to book their vacations with the launch of their in-house packaged vacations product—Getaways by Southwest™. These vacation packages, sold and serviced by Southwest®, offer signature flexibility and benefits that Customers want.
